field.name: ga_account
field.label: Google Analytics Account
field.description: Enter a Google Analytics property account number to load Google Analytics and send data to the account

field.name: disqus_shortname
field.label: Disqus Shortname
field.description: Enter your Disqus shortname to load the Disqus library

field.name: addthis_pubid
field.label: AddThis PubID
field.description: Enter your AddThis pubid number to load the AddThis library

field.name: google_site_verification
field.label: google-site-verification
field.description: Enter your Google Webmaster Tools site verification number

field.name: msvalidate
field.label: msvalidate.01
field.description: Enter your Bing/Yahoo site validation number

field.name: lqx_options
field.label: Lyquix Library Options
field.description: Object of options to override Lyquix default settings

field.name: add_css_libraries
field.label: Additional CSS Libraries
field.description: Enter one URL per line for additional javascript libraries you need for your project. We recommend: a) remove the protcol (http or https) from the URL, b) use the minified version for the production site

field.name: non_min_js
field.label: Use original JS
field.description: Uses the original JS files instead of the minified versions. Activate only for development.

field.name: lessjs
field.label: Use less.js
field.description: Uses LESS instead of CSS with JavaScript processing. Activate only for development. Not recommended for production as it degrades page performance.

field.name: add_js_libraries
field.label: Additional Javascript Libraries
field.description: Enter one URL per line for additional javascript libraries you need for your project. We recommend: a) remove the protcol (http or https) from the URL, b) use the minified version for the production site

field.name: min_screen
field.label: Minimum Screen Size
field.description: Select the minimum screen size that will be allowed

field.name: max_screen
field.label: Maximum Screen Size
field.description: Select the maximum screen size that will be allowed

field.name: fluid_screen
field.label: Fluid Layout Screens
field.description: Select for what screen sizes should fluid layout be enabled

field.name: fluid_device
field.label: Fluid Layout Devices
field.description: Select what devices are allowed to have fluid layouts

field.name: mobiledetect_method
field.label: Mobile Detect Method
field.description: Selects the method for detecting mobile devices. Adds CSS classes mobile, tablet and phone to the body tag if applicable. Server-side (PHP) is the default method but if your site uses page cache, you should use client-side method.
